name: Home Bake Waffles
description: A French batter baked to a golden brown. Put in a toaster or oven to warm up for a few minutes for a softer waffle or longer for a crisp waffle. Depending on your preference, waffles pair very well with savoury foods such as curry or sweet ones such as jam, butter and syrup or as a dessert with a blob of your favourite ice cream or whipeed cream and strawberries.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
